title: BloodyMaryW
body:
Watch out! Some say this chick is crazy.
Her name is Clara Wieland...
Apparently she got so jealous of her brother and desired his wife so badly, she killed him and his entire family.
Oh wait... that's not how she told the story is it? 
Just believe everything she says and you'll be fine.

title: Clara
body:
Help please! You must help me! My brother has gone insane...
He is hearing voice. It runs in our family. Oh, but please help me!
You will help me won't you?
[[ yes |thank you ]] [[ no |oh no ]]

title: thank you
body:
Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!
I don't know what I would do if you didn't help me.
Okay... So... how you can help is by listening to what I have to say and tell me if it makes sense.
Ready?
[[ yes |here we go ]] [[ no |wait]]

title: oh no
body:
Oh no! Are you sure?
Isn't there anything I could do to get you to help me... I can be very persuasive..
[[ yes |here we go ]] [[ no |wait ]]

title: here we go
body:
So my brother started hearing voices, telling him to kill his loved ones. 
It was so horrible... he killed his beautiful, caring,... kind,... 
sweet,... voluptuous... uh wife, whom I've know since childhood and all his children.
Do you believe me?
[[ yes |good ]] [[ no |not good ]]

title: wait
body:
Okay I can wait till your ready to listen to me...
waiting.... waiting... waiting...
Ready yet?
[[ yes |here we go ]] [[ no |not good]]

title: good
body:
Oh good I knew it was believable... I mean I knew you would believe me. 
He came after me next, and I thought I was going to have to defend myself... I can't even say how.
However, it turns out a biloquist was tricking him. When he found himself, he ended his own life.
He couldn't bare what he had done. I could never have killed him, but I am still glad I didn't have to. 
Do you believe me?
[[ yes |I knew it ]] [[ no |huh ]]

title: not good
body:
Well that's not good...
Why are you being so unreasonable?
Please just listen to me!
[[ yes |here we go ]]

title: I knew it
body:
I knew it! I knew you would trust me. After all, I am a women and I obvious could not kill anyone.
Well, not unless I was hysterical... which I am clearly not. Just listen to how calmly I tell you my story.
Yes, I was accused of being intimate with the person responsible for my brother's violence, and yeah it is true I heard voices a few times true, my dreams merged with reality, and I lost sometime. 
But I was abnormally close to my brother and his wife. I wouldn't hurt them even if I did feel lonely sometimes.
And I was very careful when telling my story. I was careful to remember all the important details.
I'm so glad you believe me. Thank you!

title: huh
body:
What are you saying.... Are you saying I killed my brother and his gorgeous wife out of rage? 
Are you saying I framed an obvious suspect and ran away from my horrible crimes. 
Are you saying I am careful and calculated and using the assumption that I am weak and fragile to my advantage? 
That is just absurd. I will not sit here and listen to you accuse me of such horrid things! Leave! Go!
